body_html: API Review Committee is supportive of a new group argument added to the existing depthwise_conv2D API to address this use case. If someone wants to revive #10482, it looks like it changes the API without modifying the underlying kernels (which would be another step needed for full performance).
body_text: API Review Committee is supportive of a new group argument added to the existing depthwise_conv2D API to address this use case. If someone wants to revive #10482, it looks like it changes the API without modifying the underlying kernels (which would be another step needed for full performance).
body: API Review Committee is supportive of a new group argument added to the existing depthwise_conv2D API to address this use case. If someone wants to revive #10482, it looks like it changes the API without modifying the underlying kernels (which would be another step needed for full performance).
